com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form

Class MCFSingleSelectStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form.MCFStep
      • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form.MCFSingleSelectStep

  • public class MCFSingleSelectStep
extends MCFStep
    Single Select Form Step. Provides a list of options and returns only one selected option. Child of MCFStep.
